member.name: T:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.ActionTray.UIActionTray
member.summary: The is a dockable, customizable, slide-out controller with a dragTab that can be attached to the edge of any parent . The handles sliding the attached based on the . The can either be created in a .xib file in Xcode or manually in C# code.
member.remarks: WARNING! You MUST manually set the 's when the first loads or the tray will not display or behave correctly.
member.description: The can be styled by setting its and properties. You can also control the position of the dragTab by setting the tray's , tabOffset and tabWidth properties.

member.name: T:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.ActionTray.UIActionTrayManager
member.summary: The controls a collection of s and manages them like a set of palettes or menus. Only one in the collection can be open at one time. The defines events that can be handled based on the user's interaction with any in the group.
member.remarks: The will automatically close any open when another tray in the group is opened.

member.name: P:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.UIActionToast.duration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration in seconds that this message will be displayed.
member.remarks: Set the duration to zero (0) to display the message forever until dismissed by the user or programmatically. This provides an alternative to setting the length property to a .

member.name: P:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.UIActionToast.length
member.summary: Gets or sets the length that the message will be displayed
member.remarks: This provides an alternative to setting the duration in seconds

member.name: P:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.UIActionToast.fadeInDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the fade in animation for this message
member.value: The duration of the fade in.

member.name: P:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.UIActionToast.fadeOutDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the fade out animation for this message
member.value: The duration of the fade in.

member.summary: User interface action toast gravity.

member.name: F:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.UIActionToastGravity.Top
member.summary: Displays the Toast message at the top of the screen

member.summary: Displays the Toast message in the middle of the screen

member.name: F:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.UIActionToastGravity.Custom
member.summary: Displays the Toast message at a custom position

member.name: T:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.UIActionToastLength
member.summary: Provides a alternative way to specify how long a message will be displayed

member.name: F:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.UIActionToastLength.Forever
member.summary: The message will be displayed until the user touches it or it is removed programatically

member.name: F:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.UIActionToastLength.Short
member.summary: The message will be displayed for a short amount of time

member.name: F:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.UIActionToastLength.Medium
member.summary: The message will be displayed for a medium amount of time

member.name: F:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.UIActionToastLength.Long
member.summary: The message will be displayed for a long amount of time

member.name: T:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.iOSDevice
member.summary: Helper class that returns information about the iOS device that the Xamarin.iOS app is running on

member.name: P:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.iOSDevice.isPhone
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is phone.
member.value: true if is phone; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.iOSDevice.isPad
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is pad.
member.value: true if is pad; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.iOSDevice.is568h
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is a is568h device such as the iPhone 5.

member.name: P:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.iOSDevice.isRetina
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this has a retina display.
member.value: true if is retina; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.iOSDevice.isIOS7
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the app is running on an iOS 7 device.
member.value: true if is IO s7; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.iOSDevice.currentDeviceOrientation
member.summary: Gets the current device orientation.

member.name: P:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.iOSDevice.RotatedScreenBounds
member.summary: Returns the bounds for the device's MainScreen adjusted to fit the current UIInterfaceOrientation

member.name: P:Appracatappra.ActionComponents.iOSDevice.AvailableScreenBounds
member.summary: Returns the bounds for the device's MainScreen adjusted to fit the current UIInterfaceOrientation taking into account if the system status bar is being displayed
member.value: The rotated screen bounds optionally minus the system status bar area
